sentences.sentence: There is no reset to zero , which means that the synthesiser loop lock-up time will be variable.
sentences.translation: 没有复位至零，这意味着合成回路锁定时间将是可变的。

sentences.sentence: "I find that American & Scandinavian accents work better with women. " In response to a question about the American accent of his synthesiser.
sentences.translation: “我发现美国人和斯堪的纳维亚人更喜欢和女士一起工作。”回应一个关于他的电子发声器的美国口音问题。
